hitCount += 1;

item.title: Help with vengence
item.dc:creator: @puresdeath puresdeath
item.description:
@puresdeath wrote:

how can i make my vengence work even if your not in combat, and how can i make it where you dont have to wait a certain amount of time heres the part i think its at ill give a few codes

public int Vengeance = -10; public int hitTimer = 0; public int hitCount = 0;

[code]if (Vengeance > -10)
Vengeance -= 0;

if (hitTimer > 0)
hitTimer -=1;

if (Vengeance >= 0 && hitTimer <= 0 && hitCount <= 5) {
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitDiff = misc.random(30);
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
hitTimer = 10;
hitCount += 1;
}[/code]

[code]if(Vengeance >= 1) {sendMessage(“You must wait 1 min before activating vengeance again.”);

}if(Vengeance <= 0 && hitTimer <= 0 && playerLevel[6] >= 96 && PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) {
Vengeance = 120;
hitTimer = 10;
hitCount = 0;
stillgfx(422, absY, absX);
startAnimation(1979);
txt4 = “Taste Vengeance!”;
string4UpdateRequired = true;
sendMessage(“You activate Vengeance!.”);
}
if(playerLevel[6] <= 95) {
sendMessage(“You need to be at least 96 magic to activate Vengeance.”);
}
if(!(PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null)) {
sendMessage(“You must be in combat to activate Vengeance.”);
}
break;[/code]

that is the whole thing, if you can tell me what to change so i can do it more then once without waiting and without having to attack someone. thanks

Read full topic
